author: leif
msg: docs.vsl can now be accessed in both project specific builds and the global build.

author: leif
msg: Fix more cases where image files were being copied with filtering on!

author: leif
msg: Modify the dist build so that it no longer deletes the contents of the dist directory
when completed.  This makes the full dist build work more cleanly and saves
having to rebuild jars multiple times.

author: leif
msg: Full dist build was breaking because the instrument dist build was deleting
